meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>road</kanji> <kanji>road</kanji> is obviously the best kind of road. It's double road, after all. So, what is this ultimate road? It is a <vocabulary>paved road</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
